column4: I would like to use my mp3 player to create a USB bootdisk for installing the new version but it says its a problem with the partitionnumber, any ide?
tell us the actual error and what you're doing that creates the error
you said - now tell us the exact error, and what you are doing to create the error
how can you not know the error, yet your telling us part of it ? what command/tool are you using that creates the error
